title: Arsenal v Bournemouth, LIVE: All the goals and updates as Unai Emery's side look to go third
text:
Arsenal know victory over Bournemouth will take them up to third in the Premier League as the two sides meet at the Emirates Stadium on Sunday.

Unai Emery's side are looking to continue the form from Thursday night when they turned on the style to comfortably dispatch Standard Liege in the Europa League.

For Bournemouth, they have not won on any of their five visits to the Emirates Stadium and will hope that changes this weekend.

Follow all the action as it happens in north London with Sportsmail.
description: Arsenal know victory over Bournemouth will take them up to third in the Premier League as the two sides meet at the Emirates Stadium on Sunday. Follow all the action with SPENCER MORGAN.
